stimulusHtml: Three small, charged spheres are initially all fixed in place at the relative positions indicated in the figure. The sphere on the left has a charge -Q, while the other two spheres each have a charge +Q. The sphere on the right is then released from rest. Gravitational forces are negligible. Which of the following claims best describes the motion of the released sphere?
choicesHtml: It travels to the right with a constant acceleration.
It travels to the right with an acceleration that decreases in magnitude.
It travels to the left with a constant acceleration.
It travels to the left with an acceleration that increases in magnitude.
